description: Shapefile containing a set of gridded map layers showing the average abundance of the six most abundant Copepod species  from the CPR for different time windows (seasonal, annual) using geospatial modelling. The spatial modelling tool used to calculate the gridded abundance maps is based on DIVA (Data-Interpolating Variational Analysis).
keywords: features, OOPS_products, Copepods, Abundance, Spatial modelling, Biota, North Sea, North Atlantic Ocean
name: EMODnet OOPS products
